trends: There has been one other sighting in Quebec
There were no other sightings in Quebec on or around June 4th 2013
Summary: One craft with 5 or more very bright white lights under it flying in air corridor at jet fighter speed
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in condo in Quebec City with huge windows on the last floor of the building just aside an airplane corridor. Planes always come from east to west to land at Jean-Lesage international airport. On June 4th 2013 around 11h05-11h10pm, I started looking at the beautiful sky and stars. For the entire month of May, I had not been able to look so much at the stars because of the bad wheather. Then while looking at the sky, an object with very bright white lights under it suddently appeared in the sky at 90 degrees angle just above my head. The object was flying west to east at jet fighter speed but made no soundI could hear. I took my googles to have a better look at it. It was obviously not an airplane. It had at least 5 to 7 very whitish bright lights undert it. I lost sight of the object after 2 minutes max. Object was gaining altitude and disappeared in the sky eastward. Only feeling I had was that this was not a plane.
